entities.description: Action of trying to cut down or stop using any prescription pain relievers in the past 12 months.
Being unable to cut down or stop using prescription pain relievers more than one time in the past 12 months.
Often wishing to cut down or stop using prescription pain relievers in the past 12 months.
Any long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or made worse by using a prescription pain reliever in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's attempt to cut down or stop using prescription pain relievers in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent's failure to cut down or stop using prescription pain relievers more than once in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent's frequent wish to cut down or stop using prescription pain relievers in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent's long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or made worse by using prescription pain relievers in the past 12 months.
